label: specifiedOrganizationalCertification
comment: An organizational certification specified for this production facility.
An organizational certification specified for this production process.

rangeIncludes.comment: The process of certifying organizational performance or qualification requirements as stipulated in regulations.

domainIncludes.comment: A man made physical structure, such as a building, in which something is produced.
A naturally occurring or designed sequence of operations or events in order to produce something.
